job_description: Junior QA EngineerTasktop software synchronizes information between different business units and across corporation borders, enabling true business to business process integration. From Fortune 500 automobile manufacturers and financial institutions to burgeoning start-ups, Tasktop software is improving the state of software delivery in all types of businesses around the globe. To achieve this level of integration, we need to connect a lot of systems! From open source to the biggest commercial tools, we’re integrating with it.Do you like to break things? As a Junior QA Engineer, you will join a small team of QA Engineers that have a knack for breaking new features before they reach the customer.  A day in your life could consist of crushing the product with load tests or developing and executing automated and manual tests.  If you get tired of breaking things and want to exercise your developer chops, jump right in and help extend our internal test execution and reporting tools. Did we mention you get paid to break things?
job_requirements: QualificationsWe are looking for conscientious team-players with experience or passion in some of the following:• Java Application Testing (Java, Jubula, JUnit)• Web UI Test Automation (Selenium / Protractor)• Angular / Javascript• Interest in exploring other technologies (e.g., Ruby/Rails, Play Framework, Java, Python)• Knowledge of Windows/Linux/Mac More about TasktopSpun out of research conducted at UBC (Eclipse Mylyn) 8 years ago, Tasktop has since garnered numerous awards including Best Employer by Small Business BC, named one of The Best Companies to Work for in BC, and was named Ready to Rocket by BCTIA. Our CEO, Mik Kersten, was named Top 40 Under 40 by Business In Vancouver. Check out more at https://www.tasktop.com.Open To All Majors:No
